PHP Syntax & Variables

Implementation/Guide

PHP scripts start with . You can place PHP code anywhere in your document. PHP files have a default file extension of ".php". A PHP file normally contains HTML tags and some PHP scripting code. 

<?php echo "Hello World!"; ?>

Common Issues

Make sure your PHP file has the correct file extension (.php) and that PHP is properly installed on your server. Always ensure that PHP opening and closing tags are correctly placed. Variables in PHP are case-sensitive, so be careful with variable naming.
